channel.title: How do i make my client run
channel.description: every single time i try to get it to run it says starting scape server on 0.0.0.0:43594 how do i change the 0.0.0.0 to fit my server plz help me!!!

item.title: How do i make my client run
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

Well 0.0.0.0 is like ur localhost as beastly sorta said…

You need to have port forwarded for the no-ip or DUC you are using to work.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my client run

item.title: How do i make my client run
item.dc:creator: @Beastly1 Beastly¿
item.description:
@Beastly1 wrote:

Open your source folder, and search for server.java. Then Press Ctrl + F and search for:

0.0.0.0.

Just change that to 127.0.0.1, or your server ip (E.g. Yourserverip.no-ip.biz) or Whatever.

Hope this helped.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my client run
